description.p: Using Eleazzaar's custom race balance sheet, this option allows players to make something unavailable in official content. Races made vary slightly between over- and underpowered based on how efficiently racial points are used up. Keep points between 20 and 30 for balance. The builder will display your points on the character sheet.
Scores are slightly overtuned since anti-synergies cannot be added.

sheet.description: {{eleazzaar points:points}}

description.p: You can communicate simple ideas with small or smaller beasts.

sheet.description: You can communicate simple ideas with small or smaller beasts.

description.p: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see, provided the creature is within 30 feet of you and shares a language.

sheet.description: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see, provided the creature is within 30 feet of you and shares a language.

description.p: You have a climb speed of 30 ft.

sheet.description: You have a climb speed of 30 ft.

description.p: You have the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free.

sheet.description: You have the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free.

description.p: You have a swim speed of 30 ft.

sheet.description: You have a swim speed of 30 ft.

description.p: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

sheet.description: When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

description.p: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

sheet.description: You can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

description.p: Your move speed cannot be decreased through armor effects.

sheet.description: Your move speed cannot be decreased through armor effects.

description.p: You ignore a rare type of rough terrain (consult with your DM).

sheet.description: You ignore a rare type of rough terrain (consult with your DM).

description.p: You ignore a common type of rough terrain (consult with your DM).

sheet.description: You ignore a common type of rough terrain (consult with your DM).
You ignore non-magical rough terrain.

description.p: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

sheet.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

description.p: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is 11 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

sheet.description: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is {{eleazzaar:natural armor}}. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

description.p: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

sheet.description: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is {{eleazzaar:natural armor}}. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

description.p: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

sheet.description: When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is {{eleazzaar:natural armor}}. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.
Your AC is increased by 1.

description.p: Your powerful lungs let you hold your breath for up to 15 minutes.

sheet.description: Your powerful lungs let you hold your breath for up to 15 minutes.

description.p: You can breathe both air and water.

sheet.description: You can breathe both air and water.

description.p: While not incapacitated, you are able to breathe in any conditions.

sheet.description: While not incapacitated, you are able to breathe in any conditions.

description.p: You do not need to breathe.

sheet.description: You do not need to breathe.

description.p: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can’t be wearing medium or heavy armor.

sheet.description: You have a flying speed of {{speed:fly}} feet. To use this speed, you can’t be wearing medium or heavy armor.

description.p: You have a flying speed of 30 feet.

sheet.description: You have a flying speed of {{speed:fly}} feet.

description.p: You can choose to stay in the air even when knocked prone or after moving less than half your flight speed on your turn.

sheet.description: You can choose to stay in the air even when knocked prone or after moving less than half your flight speed on your turn.

description.p: You must land at the end of your turn's movement.

sheet.description: You must land at the end of your turn's movement.

description.p: You have a maximum fall speed of 60 feet. You always land on your feet and do not take fall damage.

sheet.description: You have a maximum fall speed of 60 feet. You always land on your feet and do not take fall damage.

description.p: You have advantage on a certain rare roll (consult with your DM)

sheet.description: You have advantage on a certain rare roll (consult with your DM)

description.p: You gain proficiency in 2 simple weapons of your choice.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in 2 simple weapons of your choice.

description.p: You gain proficiency in 2 martial weapons of your choice.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in 2 martial weapons of your choice.

description.p: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 base damage.

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4+{{strength:modifier}} bludgeoning damage.

description.p: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 base damage.

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6+{{strength:modifier}} bludgeoning damage.

description.p: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d8 base damage.

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d8+{{strength:modifier}} bludgeoning damage.

description.p: You have a natural weapon which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal 1d4 + your strength modifier damage.

sheet.description: You have a natural weapon which deals 1d4+{{strength:modifier}} damage.

description.p: You have a natural weapon which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal 1d6 + your strength modifier damage.

sheet.description: You have a natural weapon which deals 1d6+{{strength:modifier}} damage.

description.p: You have a natural weapon which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal 1d8 + your strength modifier damage.

sheet.description: You have a natural weapon which deals 1d8+{{strength:modifier}} damage.

description.p: You have a natural weapon which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal 1d10 + your strength modifier damage.

sheet.description: You have a natural weapon which deals 1d10+{{strength:modifier}} damage.

description.p: Your natural weapon does not require a free hand to use.

sheet.description: Your natural weapon does not require a free hand to use.

description.p: You can use dexterity when attacking with your natural weapon instead of strength.

sheet.description: You can use dexterity when attacking with your natural weapon instead of strength.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in a tool.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in a skill.

description.p: You gain proficiency in a skill of your choice.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in a skill.

description.p: You add double your proficiency to a rare subset of a skill (consult with your DM).

sheet.description: You add double your proficiency to a rare subset of a skill (consult with your DM).

description.p: You add double your proficiency to a subset of a skill (consult with your DM).

sheet.description: You add double your proficiency to a subset of a skill (consult with your DM).

description.p: You gain proficiency in a skill and can add double your proficiency to it.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in a skill and can add double your proficiency to it.

description.p: You gain proficiency in the athletics skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the acrobatics skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the slight of hand skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the stealth skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the arcana skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the history skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the investigation skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the nature skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the religion skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the animal handling skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the insight skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the medicine skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the perception skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the survival skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the deception skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the intimidation skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the performance skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You gain proficiency in the persuasion skill and can add double your proficiency to it.
You learn a cantrip of your choice. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells.

sheet.description: You learn a cantrip of your choice.

description.p: You learn a level 1 spell of your choice upon reaching level 3. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells.

sheet.description: You learn a level 1 spell of your choice. You can use it once per day.

description.p: You learn a level 2 spell of your choice upon reaching level 3. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells.

sheet.description: You learn a level 2 spell of your choice. You can use it once per day.

description.p: You learn a level 2 spell of your choice upon reaching level 5. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells.

sheet.description: You learn a level 2 spell of your choice. You can use it once per day.

description.p: You learn a level 3 spell of your choice upon reaching level 5. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells.

sheet.description: You learn a level 3 spell of your choice. You can use it once per day.

description.p: You learn a level 1 spell of your choice. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells. You can cast it once per day.

sheet.description: You learn a level 1 spell of your choice. You can cast it once per day.

description.p: You learn a level 2 spell of your choice. Choose whether to use intelligence, wisdom, or charisma for your spellcasting stat. If you gain other spells from your race, use the same stat for all spells. You can cast it once per day.

sheet.description: You learn a level 2 spell of your choice. You can cast it once per day.

description.p: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

sheet.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

description.p: Your darkvision has a radius of 30 feet.

sheet.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 30 feet.

description.p: Your darkvision has a radius of 60 feet.

sheet.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 60 feet.

description.p: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

sheet.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

description.p: Your blindsight has a radius of 30 feet.

sheet.description: Your blindsight has a radius of 30 feet.

description.p: Your blindsight has a radius of 30 feet. You are blind beyond this radius.

sheet.description: Your blindsight has a radius of 30 feet. You are blind beyond this radius.

description.p: A monster with darkvision can see in the dark within a radius of 30 ft. The monster can see in dim light within the radius as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. The monster can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

sheet.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 30 ft.

description.p: Your type is something other than humanoid.
You are considered both humanoid and another creature type for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered both humanoid and another creature type for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You do not need to eat or drink.

sheet.description: You do not need to eat or drink.

description.p: You have proficiency with artisan’s tools (tinker’s tools). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours (unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep the device functioning), or when you use your action to dismantle it; at that time, you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time.

sheet.description: Using tinker’s tools, you can construct a Tiny clockwork device. You can have up to three such devices active at a time.

description.p: You have acclimated to a certain type of harsh environment and can ignore penalties from being in it (consult with your DM).

sheet.description: You have acclimated to a certain type of harsh environment and can ignore penalties from being in it (consult with your DM).

description.p: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of hit points equal to your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain {{level}} hit points.

description.p: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

sheet.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

description.p: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

sheet.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

description.p: You don’t need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is “trance.”) While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

sheet.description: You don’t need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day.

description.p: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check.

sheet.description: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Insight check opposed by your Deception check.

description.p: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature’s size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature’s size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal {{level}} extra damage to the creature.

description.p: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

sheet.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

description.p: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

sheet.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

description.p: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

sheet.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

description.p: You have proficiency with light armors.

sheet.description: You have proficiency with light armors.

description.p: You have proficiency with light and medium armors.

sheet.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armors.

description.p: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

sheet.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

description.p: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can’t use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead.

description.p: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

sheet.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

description.p: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

sheet.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

description.p: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d12+{{constitution:modifier}}.

description.p: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

sheet.description: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

description.p: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

sheet.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

description.p: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to glimmer and two luminous, incorporeal wings to sprout from your back.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30 feet, and once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30 feet, and once on each of your turns, you can deal {{level}} extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell.

description.p: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing a searing light to radiate from you, pour out of your eyes and mouth, and threaten to char you.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, you and each creature within 10 feet of you take radiant damage equal to half your level (rounded up). In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, you and each creature within 10 feet of you take {{level:half:up}} radiant damage. In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal {{level}} extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell.

description.p: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to turn into pools of darkness and two skeletal, ghostly, flightless wings to sprout from your back. The instant you transform, other creatures within 10 feet of you that can see you must each succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra necrotic damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: The instant you transform, other creatures within 10 feet of you that can see you must each succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC {{necrotic shroud:dc}}) or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, once on each of your turns, you can deal {{level}} extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell.

description.p: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

sheet.description: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

description.p: You gain a feat of your choice.
You have advantage on saving throws against diseases.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against diseases.

description.p: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

description.p: You can perform 6 hours of light activity instead of sleeping to gain the benefits of a long rest.

sheet.description: You can perform 6 hours of light activity instead of sleeping to gain the benefits of a long rest.

description.p: You are considered an aberration for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered an aberration for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered a beast for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a beast for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a celestial for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a construct for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a dragon for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered an elemental for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered a fey for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a fey for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered a fiend for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a fiend for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered a giant for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a giant for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered a monstrosity for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a monstrosity for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered an ooze for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered an ooze for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered a plant for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered a plant for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

description.p: You are considered undead for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

sheet.description: You are considered undead for the purposes of spell targeting and effects.

element.name: Detect Balance (Eleazzaar)
element.description: Tired of blatantly overpowered homebrew races? Can't seem to make something powerful enough to be useful? Eleazzaar has a solution for you! The Detect Balance sheet allows you to fine-tune custom races to fit the power curve of officially recognized content with an easy point-buy system.
